name.str_pl: copies of Kingdom Come Excerpts I

description: "The disgraced folk of the Big Three had no place to call home. Rejoice! What was once shackles have become wings. Rejoice! A world without indifference, a world without flight. Rejoice! No more shall base man suffer under the fickle whims of martial lords. Rejoice! Hear ye, hear ye! The time of recreance is nigh! Rejoice!"

name.str_pl: copies of Kingdom Come Excerpts II

description: "Outcasts we once were. Fools! Outcasts to them, freemen to us! They threw us away believing they were discarding us, but it was what we desired. Yes, we were without talent in the martial arts! Yes, we were without talent in the path to heaven! What of it! Just because a man can't kill without remorse, shoot bursts of gale from his palms, and flit across the landscape like a sparrow taking flight, he is to be considered worthless? Heresy! Heresy!"

name.str_pl: copies of Kingdom Come Excerpts III

description: "The warmth and embrace of our King granted us a vision. A vision of a world without martial dominance. In places he called 'cities' mankind walked amongst one another without asking for one another's martial attainment at a moment's glance. No man walked away free from murder simply by claiming it was a duel. No woman was forced to toil for her master merely because she was one realm lower than the master. No bullish elders fought visciously to maintain their martial level. It was a world, that existed here and now. If only we could grasp it! Strong enough to have it all; too weak to take it!"

name.str_pl: copies of Kingdom Come Excerpts IV

description: "Thus the King sheltered us from our own fathers and brothers. Shielded us from those that would decide a child meaningless due to their virtue of being just a few days behind their supposed day of martial enlightenment. How silly it all was! Judging folks by their prowess of throwing punches! Mr. X kicks a tiny bit better than Ms. Y, so clearly Mr. X was in the right! Mr. A could hurl a horseshoe nine-hundred feet, and by grace of this fabulous feat he is definitely superior to Mr. B in every way who could only throw it eight-hundred feet! Haha! Haha!"

name.str_pl: copies of Kingdom Come Excerpts V

description: "By the will of the splendid King, our monarch in life and death, we, the first of his followers, shall henceforth be acclaimed as Princes. Our duty shall be to protect and serve. We solemnly swear to never use our higher standing for any acts of injustice. Our enforcement of order shall judged by the people, and if the people deem us unfit for rule, we shall step down without odium or ire. Glory, for mankind."
